item.title: Top pediatricians buck RFK Jr.’s anti-vaccine meddling on COVID shot guidance
item.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends children under age 2 get vaccinated.

item.title: RFK Jr. posted fishing pics as CDC reeled from shooting linked to vaccine disinfo
item.description: Anti-vaccine activist RFK Jr. has vilified COVID-19 vaccines and the CDC.

item.title: What to Know About Traveling to China for Business
item.description: Recent developments and an escalating trade war have made travel to cities like Beijing challenging but by no means impossible.

item.title: What to Know About Traveling to China for Business
item.description: Recent developments and an escalating trade war have made travel to cities like Beijing challenging but by no means impossible.

item.title: The Pandemic Appears to Have Accelerated Brain Aging, Even in People Who Never Got Covid
item.description: Stress, isolation, and uncertainty appear to have caused the brain to age quicker for those who lived through the crisis.

item.title: The Pandemic Appears to Have Accelerated Brain Aging, Even in People Who Never Got Covid

item.title: Plastic surgeon off the hook for alleged COVID fraud, injecting kids with saline
item.description: Trump administration says dismissal is “in the interests of justice.”
